EmailTemplate.name: Non Protected Area Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to Proceed with Townhall {!Partner_Application__c.First_Name__c} {!Quote.QuoteNumber}{!Contact.FirstName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Partner_Application__c.First_Name__c} Please be advised that 30 days have lapsed since the Demand Prealable Request Date. As a reminder, you can now proceed to the Townhall website and complete the necessary steps.
Thank You.
SunPower Corporation
